responsibilities: Build and scale best in class data and reporting apps communicating metrics & performance indicators.
Engage directly with key business partners to understand business strategies and solution needs.
Drive and lead functional & technical discussions with development teams.
Build various tools and features for Data and ML platforms, including data processing, insights portal, data observability, data lineage, model hub, and data visualization.
Build custom solutions ground up or customize open source products for Apple’s needs.
Produce high-quality software under tight deadlines and constraints.
Build innovative tools and frameworks that can extend the functionality of 3rd party BI tools using APIs.
qualifications: Ability to think creatively and have a real passion for building highly scalable applications.
Ability to work well in collaborative teams.
Ability to tackle problems with imaginative solutions.
analysis:
The job responsibilities focus on building and scaling data and reporting applications, engaging with business partners, leading discussions with development teams, designing end-to-end applications, and building tools and features for Data and ML platforms. The responsibilities also include building custom solutions, producing high-quality software, and extending the functionality of BI tools using APIs. The skills required include creativity, problem-solving, communication, collaboration, and imaginative solutions.

There is a mention of building tools and features for Data and ML platforms, which could potentially involve working with machine learning models. However, there is no explicit mention of Generative AI or language models (LLMs) in the responsibilities or skills. The focus seems to be more on data processing, data visualization, and building scalable applications rather than specifically on GenAI or LLMs.

Therefore, based on the provided responsibilities and skills, it does not appear that the job explicitly involves working with Generative AI or language models.
